text.p: Suppose [mathjaxinline]\dim V = 14[/mathjaxinline] and let [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] be a subspace of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline].

True or false: If we construct a linear transformation [mathjaxinline]T: V \rightarrow \mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline] such that [mathjaxinline]W = \mathrm{Ker}(T)[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]\dim W[/mathjaxinline] must be 12.
